column5: Have the perfect little getaway at the quaint and cozy Cabins on the Square. The location is perfect! Located in the middle of the Â shopping square and on the beautiful rolling river in downtown Wimberley, TX. You are in walking distance to EVERYTHING. There are countless quirky finds in all of the local shops. You never know what you will find! After you are all done walking, shopping and nibbling at the local hot spots, come sit right outside your cabin on the bank of the Blanco River.
